DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate pharmacological effect two herbal medicinal product ( Neurapas balance Pascoflair 425 mg ) comparison placebo brain activity .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacological Effects Neurapas® Balance Pascoflair® 425 mg Brain Activity Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation pharmacological effect Neurapas® balance Pascoflair® 425 mg quantitative measurement brain activity 16 healthy volunteer .
